about_the_game:
The Audio Ambience Booster Pack for GameGuru Classic contains over 190 short loopable music tracks, sound and voice effects covering Horror, Sci-Fi, Modern, Future-tech and a range of other genres - giving you a massive boost to your audio collections. Each sound and track has been custom made for this pack and is ideal for game development.

Included in this DLC you'll find:

  • Over 30 Voices effects
  • More than 100 Sci-Fi and modern effects
  • 26 Looping Sci-Fi and Modern audio tracks
  • Over 40 Horror effects
detailed_description:
The Audio Ambience Booster Pack for GameGuru Classic contains over 190 short loopable music tracks, sound and voice effects covering Horror, Sci-Fi, Modern, Future-tech and a range of other genres - giving you a massive boost to your audio collections. Each sound and track has been custom made for this pack and is ideal for game development.

Included in this DLC you'll find:

  • Over 30 Voices effects
  • More than 100 Sci-Fi and modern effects
  • 26 Looping Sci-Fi and Modern audio tracks
  • Over 40 Horror effects
name: GameGuru - Audio Ambience Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse

short_description: The Audio Ambience Booster Pack contains over 190 high quality audio and musical tracks for your GameGuru Classic creations
